Foreshadow {5}{B} [i](You may cast this spell for its foreshadow cost. If you do, also trigger its “dies” ability when it enters.)[/i]
Flying, deathtouch
When Grim Raven of Wesgoth dies, return target non-Bird creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
